questions.questionText: Which film won the Academy Award for Best Picture in 1959?
Who won the 1999 Academy Award for Best Leading Actor for playing the role of Lester Burnham in American Beauty?
Who won the 2019 Academy Award for Best Leading Actor for playing the role of Arthur Fleck in Joker?

Which film won the Academy Award for Best Picture in 1965?
Who won the 1988 Academy Award for Best Leading Actor for playing the role of Raymond Babbitt in Rain Man?

answers.text: In the Name of the Father

questions.questionText: Who won the 1974 Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor for playing the role of Vito Corleone in The Godfather Part II?
